import React, { useState } from 'react' import classes from './Checkout.module.css' import Product from '../Windsurf/NewProduct/Product/Product' const Checkout = (props) =>{ let Prise = 0, vat = 112.87; for (let i = 0; i < props.cart_product.length; i++) { Prise+= Number(props.cart_product[i].Prise)*props.cart_product[i].Quantity } const [color, changeColor] = useState([1,0,0]); return
